properties.displayName: Azure Cache for Redis should use private link
properties.description: Private endpoints lets you connect your virtual network to Azure services without a public IP address at the source or destination. By mapping private endpoints to your Azure Cache for Redis instances, data leakage risks are reduced. Learn more at: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-cache-for-redis/cache-private-link.

metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy

Specifies when the existence of the related resources should be evaluated. The delay is only used for evaluations that are a result of a create or update resource request. Allowed values are AfterProvisioning, AfterProvisioningSuccess, AfterProvisioningFailure, or an ISO 8601 duration between 0 and 360 minutes.
